title: HOUR 3 - Chris Broussard
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Chris Broussard
description:
In hour 3, Colin explains why fans cant have it both ways. Dak Prescott's massive contract which may not be to deserving has put America's team in a bind. Chris Broussard joins the show to talk the Brooklyn Nets, Kawhi Leonard and the Clippers situation and more.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
